alert.note: Alert for Wayne (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 16 at 5:15PM CDT until August 16 at 11:30PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Urban and Small Stream Flood Advisory for... Wayne County in southeastern Mississippi... * Until 815 PM CDT. * At 515 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 1 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. * Some locations that will experience flooding include... Waynesboro, Clara, Buckatunna, Woodwards, Winchester, Boice, West King, Whistler, Chicora, Denham, Hiwannee, Hollis Creek, Gretna, Strengthford, Belmont, Battles, Eucutta, Lightsey and Eret. Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 3 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
